entry.title: BLOWING SNOW ADVISORY , Wunnummin Lake
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 12:23 PM CST Friday 23 December 2022

entry.title: Current Conditions: Light Snow, -20.8°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Big Trout Lake Airport 1:47 PM CST Friday 23 December 2022
Condition: Light Snow
Temperature: -20.8°C
Pressure: 102.3 kPa
Visibility: 8.1 km
Humidity: 79 %
Dewpoint: -23.5°C
Wind: km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Friday: Periods of snow. High minus 16.
entry.summary: Periods of snow. Wind northwest 30 km/h gusting to 50. High minus 16. Wind chill minus 32 this morning and minus 27 this afternoon. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 11:30 AM CST Friday 23 December 2022

entry.title: Friday night: Snow and blowing snow. Low minus 23.
entry.summary: Snow and blowing snow. Amount 5 to 10 cm. Wind northwest 30 km/h gusting to 60. Low minus 23. Wind chill minus 30 this evening and minus 36 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 11:30 AM CST Friday 23 December 2022

entry.title: Saturday: Snow and blowing snow. High minus 18.
entry.summary: Snow and blowing snow. Amount 5 cm. Wind northwest 30 km/h gusting to 60. High minus 18. Wind chill minus 36 in the morning and minus 30 in the afternoon. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 11:30 AM CST Friday 23 December 2022
